root.name: Tomodachi Collection 3DS
root.description: ControversyThe game initially allowed for two male Miis to engage in a relationship and subsequently get married. This feature, labeled as a "bug" by Nintendo, was removed from the game in a patch update not long after the game's launch. This drew heavy criticism from certain media outlets and within social networks. Curiously, the alleged bug allowed only for male same-sex marriage, and not female same-sex marriage.
